description.en: A Golem created from the Bones of the damned, and held together by the Voodoo spells of Laveau. This Golem is bound to an eternity of servitude and will forever stand by your side and pick up the loot of your victims.
description.ar: A Golem created from the Bones of the damned, and held together by the Voodoo spells of Laveau. This Golem is bound to an eternity of servitude and will forever stand by your side and pick up the loot of your victims.
description.br: Um Golem criado a partir dos Ossos dos condenados e mantido unido pelos feitiços Voodoo de Laveau. Este Golem está vinculado a uma eternidade de servidão e ficará para sempre ao seu lado e recolherá os itens de suas vítimas.
description.cns: 用被诅咒者的骨头创造的石像人，被拉沃的巫毒咒语结合在一起。这个石像人注定要被永远奴役，并且永远站在你身边，也会捡起受害者的战利品。
description.de: Der monströse Bone Golem folgt dir und hebt Gegenstände für dich auf.
description.fi: A Golem created from the Bones of the damned, and held together by the Voodoo spells of Laveau. This Golem is bound to an eternity of servitude and will forever stand by your side and pick up the loot of your victims.
description.fil: A Golem created from the Bones of the damned, and held together by the Voodoo spells of Laveau. This Golem is bound to an eternity of servitude and will forever stand by your side and pick up the loot of your victims.
description.fr: Maudit vos ennemis et ramasse les objets laissés par les monstres. Les aiguilles ne sont pas fournies. Cette poupée est lié à vous à jamais.
description.id: Golem yang terbuat dari Bones of the Damned yang disatukan oleh mantra Voodoo dari Laveau. Golem ini terikat dengan pengabdian abadi dan akan selamanya berdiri di sisi anda. Dia akan selalu siap mengambilkan semua loot yang drop.
description.it: A Golem created from the Bones of the damned, and held together by the Voodoo spells of Laveau. This Golem is bound to an eternity of servitude and will forever stand by your side and pick up the loot of your victims.
description.jp: 呪われた者の骨から作られたホネロックは、ラヴォーのブードゥー教の呪文によってつなぎ合わされている。このホネロックは永遠の隷属に縛られ、あなたの側に立って犠牲者の戦利品を拾う。
description.kr: 개구쟁이 해골을 소환하거나 해제합니다. 소환 하였을 시, 주변에 있는 아이템을 자동 습득하게 됩니다.
description.nl: A Golem created from the Bones of the damned, and held together by the Voodoo spells of Laveau. This Golem is bound to an eternity of servitude and will forever stand by your side and pick up the loot of your victims.
description.pl: A Golem created from the Bones of the damned, and held together by the Voodoo spells of Laveau. This Golem is bound to an eternity of servitude and will forever stand by your side and pick up the loot of your victims.
description.ru: Веселый череп, который будет послушно летать за вами и собирать предметы.
description.sp: Un Golem creado a partir de los Huesos de los condenados y unidos por los hechizos vudú de Laveau. Este Golem está atado a una eternidad de servidumbre, siempre estará a tu lado y recogerá el botín de tus víctimas.
description.sw: A Golem created from the Bones of the damned, and held together by the Voodoo spells of Laveau. This Golem is bound to an eternity of servitude and will forever stand by your side and pick up the loot of your victims.
description.th: โกเลมที่สร้างขึ้นจากกระดูกของผู้ถูกสาปแช่ง และยึดไว้ด้วยกันโดยคาถาวูดูแห่งลาโว Golem นี้ถูกผูกไว้กับความเป็นทาสชั่วนิรันดร์และจะยืนเคียงข้างคุณตลอดไปและหยิบของที่ตกเป็นเหยื่อของคุณ
description.tw: 召喚或解除史卡爾頓，周圍有道具時會自動拾取。
description.vi: Một con Golem được tạo ra từ Xương của những con quỷ chết tiệt, và được giữ lại với nhau bằng phép thuật Voodoo của Laveau. Con Golem này bị ràng buộc vào kiếp nô lệ vĩnh viễn và sẽ mãi mãi sát cánh bên bạn và nhặt những món đồ của nạn nhân của bạn.
